info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 06 at 8:36PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...INCOMING MODERATE TO HEAVY LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND... A band of moderate to heavy lake effect snow located along a line from roughly Covert, Michigan to near Paw Paw, MI as of 8:30 pm EST will shift southward through the next few hours and likely stall somewhere within Berrien and Cass Counties in Michigan. This includes Interstate 94, US 12, and US 31. Visibilities within this band have been less than 1/2 mile at times thanks to intense snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour and blowing and drifting snow. Expect roads to quickly become snow covered and slippery. Accidents have already been reported. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Drive slow on ice and snow.
